nodes.bodyText: minor, option ->  requestOptions  to be more consistent with other APIs.
By the way - this url doesn't work - https://aka.ms/CosmosClientEncryption

this is coming from our .net friend.
once the url is ready for dotnet this will be work too:
see dotnet: https://github.com/Azure/azure-cosmos-dotnet-v3/blob/master/Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Encryption/src/CosmosEncryptor.cs#L13
we are not shipping encryption lib for now anyway.
FYI @j82w @anujtoshniwal the link referenced from dotnet is not functional. please remember to setup link redirect for dotnet
What is the use case of inheritance here?

nodes.bodyText:
The use case is to use the same method signature for container.createItem(item, options) and allow passing the encryption option.
Please see the .net version doing the same thing, we are trying to be in par with dotnet api:
https://github.com/Azure/azure-cosmos-dotnet-v3/blob/master/Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Encryption/src/EncryptionItemRequestOptions.cs#L12
